data.title: Return of Post Office services to Horam
data.meta_description: Nus Ghani, MP for Wealden, has welcomed the news that Post Office Limited will be restoring their services inÂ Horam from today (Monday 22 February).
data.text:
Nus Ghani, MP for Wealden, has welcomed the news that Post Office Limited will be restoring their services in Horam from today (Monday 22 February).

Following the resignation of the postmaster, the Post Office branch on Horam High Street closed temporarily on 31 October 2018. Nus is keen that the service is reinstated and has been supporting Horam Parish Council in finding a permanent solution.

In the meantime, a Temporary Hosted Outreach will be reinstated from today and will be operating from Horam Centre, High Street, Horam, TN21 0EH, every Monday from 9:00am - 12:00pm.
